node.title: The future of commuting in Perth is electric, as new e-rideable safety laws set for Christmas
node.description: There is more people on the road and less people on the bus or train in the wake of the COVID-19 pandemic. Could the rise of 'active transport' like electric bikes and scooters help restore the balance?
node.content:
["It's no secret Perth is facing a massive traffic congestion problem.", "In fact, road use has spiralled\u00a0to an all time high, while public transport patronage\u00a0has been slow to recover from its COVID-induced all time low.", "But encouraged by the pandemic, another trend is emerging \u2014 the use of 'e-rideable'\u00a0modes of transport like electric bikes, scooters and skateboards.", "The uptake of e-transport was\u00a0surging across the nation, as people explore more active and socially-distant ways to commute.", "The ABC understands the WA government\u00a0will implement new laws before Christmas, setting speed limits and safety features for e-rideable devices.", "But is Perth's transport network ready to handle the new technology? Are people\u00a0ready to overcome their car obsession and make room for cyclists and e-riders?", "
Bike spike post-COVID
", "Traffic monitoring company MetroCount have devices\u00a0placed across the city which\u00a0can differentiate\u00a0between\u00a0different modes of transport.", "", "
The coastal path along West Coast Dr is one of Perth's most popular leisure routes for walkers and riders.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "\"What the numbers are telling us is that we're increasing\u00a0scooter numbers by 50 to 100 per cent over a year or two ago,\" MetroCount manager Maurice Berger said.", "He said the convenience of electric powered devices was getting people out of their cars.", "\"It's no longer necessary that they need end of trip facilities to change out of their lycra, or whatever they're wearing,\" he said.", "\"They can wear their business attire, get off the bike, lock it up and get into the office.\"", "", "
Cyclists pedal across\u00a0a\u00a0separated cyclist and pedestrian bridge in Osborne Park\u00a0during the morning peak hour.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "On the day coronavirus restrictions were initially\u00a0eased in WA in April 2020, MetroCount recorded more bikes on the\u00a0South Perth foreshore cycle path than ever before, with 5,152 counted.", "The number of\u00a0cyclists using that\u00a0path now sits at a higher daily average\u00a0than before that day.", "
Safety the biggest hurdle
", "Perth based urban planner Andrew Brodie said while electric transport was convenient, the biggest hurdle to getting people off the road and onto the path was safety.", "", "
Traffic in Perth has now exceeded pre-COVID lockdown levels.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "He said while Perth's major cycling routes were world-class, there were some dangerous gaps in the network.", "\"The problem is the gaps in between where people work\u00a0and where people live,\u00a0go to school and shop and in between those,\" he said.", "\"Just that one element of that route could be the difference between a parent allowing that child to take that route or someone choosing to commute to work on a bike.\"", "", "
A painted cycle lane ends\u00a0ahead of a busy intersection in the City of Vincent.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "", "
A cycle path abruptly ends, leading into a garden in Perth's CBD.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "Mr Berger said many of those vital connections were under the jurisdiction\u00a0of local councils, who were already feeling the financial pressure to fund\u00a0many\u00a0other services.", "\"We're talking of millions of dollars ... for some local government authorities, it's just too difficult to make that push,\" he said.", "\"[Instead] they'll do what is least required\u00a0and unfortunately, that can be unsafe practices, and they don't know it \u2014 like painting a white line or green paint on the path.", "\"Then it stops at the most dangerous point, which is the intersection, and leaves you to it.\"", "", "
Traffic lights specifically for\u00a0cyclists have been installed at many busy intersections in Perth's CBD.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "Mr Brodie said a simple rule of thumb could be applied when planning a journey.", "\"Would this route be safe enough for my seven year old daughter? And would it be safe enough for her 70 year old grandmother?,\" he said.", "\"At the moment, the reality is that our cycle network does discriminate against certain people, it doesn't give the all members of the community a real, viable option or choice to cycle.", "\"It's really geared towards the more confident cyclists and to increase ridership, we need to be appealing to all different types of cyclists, young and old.\"", "
Bike lanes the 'bare minimum'
", "Mr Brodie said painted on-road bike lanes were\u00a0the most basic remedy for cash-strapped local councils.", "", "
Mr Berger said painted on-road bike lanes with no physical barriers are unsafe for cyclists.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "\"Painted bike lanes don't offer the protection that cyclists need from faster moving cars,\" he said.", "\"Cars are still moving up to 50 to\u00a060 kph. We know that when a cyclist is hit at 45 kph\u00a0or more, they have a 50 per cent chance or less of surviving.", "\"Whereas if you reduce that speed to 30 kph, you have a 90 per cent chance of surviving.\"", "", "
Mr Brodie said bike lanes seperated by a physical barrier, like this one in Highgate, was an example of good practice.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "Mr Brodie said thoughtful street design could\u00a0encourage slower speeds.", "\"So buildings closer together and having trees closer together at regular intervals, reducing people's perception of space and forcing them to be more cautious and driving more slowly,\" he said.", "\"Sticking up a sign post saying 40 kph\u00a0and thinking your job is done is completely false.\"", "
E-rider speed a problem
", "Mr Brodie said e-bikes and e-riders\u00a0competed\u00a0for space in already crowded streets.", "\"It's hard enough accommodating bikes, pedestrians, cars and buses within a typical street, let alone trying to separate out another mode of transport. So, it's a case of which modes mix best together.\"", "He said that should be dictated by speed.", "", "
Cyclists being urged to slow down on the busy West Coast Dr shared path.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "There was no legally enforceable cycling speed limits in WA, but it was generally accepted to be 20 kph.", "MetroCount placed the average speeds of bicycles along the South Perth foreshore cycle path at 22.5 kph.", "The\u00a0continuous power of an e-bike motor is capped at 250 watts in Australia and the power must cut out when the speed reaches is 25 kph.", "", "
Speed conflicts between pedestrians, cyclists and other riders was a common problem on Perth's shared paths.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "But without government regulation in place, modifications\u00a0allow people to reach speeds exceeding 100 kph.", "The ABC understands Road Safety Minister Paul Papalia will today announce new laws\u00a0which would cap the legal speeds of e-rideable devices.", "
Bikes on buses, trains
", "Mr Brodie said dedicating a portion of peak hour train carriage space to cyclists and scooter riders\u00a0could both increase public transport use and decrease traffic congestion, especially in the outer suburbs.", "\"What that means is instead of just getting commuters within a walkable catchment of the station, you can attract commuters that are within a cycling distance of the station,\" he said.", "", "
Bikes are banned from trains servicing Perth's CBD in the morning and evening peak hour rush.(ABC News: Keane Bourke)
", "Mr Berger went further, saying that should extend to buses.", "\"Our bus network is huge. The highest patronage of public transport is by bus,\" he said.", "\"But we have no availability of connecting bicycle users with bus patronage, and being able to take your bike on the bus, putting it on a hook on the back.", "", "
Maurice Berger suggests allowing people to bring their bikes and other modes of transport on buses would reduce vehicle traffic.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "\"It happens in other cities, it doesn't happen here. We've got a disconnect.\"", "The WA government's infrastructure advisory body said regulatory reform was needed to allow foldable devices like e-scooters onto all bus, train and ferry services to reduce\u00a0traffic congestion and boost public transport use.", "", "
E-scooters have become more popular in Australia over recent years.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "But Transport Minister Rita Saffioti said there were no plans to change the peak hour rules to ensure there was enough room for commuters.", "Instead, she encouraged people to walk and ride to the train\u00a0and use the bike lockers provided at some stations.", "
Changing public perceptions
", "Mr Brodie said aside from infrastructure, it was about changing driver behaviours and public perceptions.", "\"In Holland, kids by the time they're 12 have to pass a cycling exam,\" he said.", "\"When you had your driving test, did you learn anything about cycling, and safe driving for cyclists?\"", "", "
Andrew Brodie is a senior urban designer at Perth-based firm Hatch RobertsDay.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "Mr Brodie admitted swaying the public and policy makers in a car-dominated city like Perth was a losing battle.", "\"There is research out there that shows that there are economic benefits (of cycling), but it's very hard to win that battle in in Perth,\" he said.", "
Local e-bike innovation
", "There are some green shoots\u00a0in the community.", "The Town of Cottesloe has become the first local government in Perth to support a self-serve\u00a0e-bike hire service.", "People can use their smartphones to scan QR codes printed on three docking stations around the neighbourhood to unlock an e-bike.", "", "
Gary Shelton is behind the self-serve e-bike hire project in Cottesloe.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "Local businessman Gary Shelton was\u00a0behind the initiative, which is in a two-year trial phase.", "\"It's just a new technology, look at cars now going electric,\" he said.", "\"Everyone wants something that is clean, green, and fun. I mean, riding these bikes is a lot of fun.\"", "", "
Traffic banks up on a recently widened section of the Mitchell Freeway during the morning peak hour rush.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "Mr Shelton said the demographic of people borrowing the e-bikes\u00a0varied.", "\"It actually varies from middle-aged to elderly people hiring them and they're doing quite long distances from Cottesloe to Fremantle,\" he said.", "\"A lot of them haven't got bikes but they've heard about electric bikes and they wanted to give it a try. There's definitely a lot of enthusiasm.\"", "Other councils were adopting different methods.", "A concept known as 'safe active streets' had been rolled out\u00a0in some neighbourhoods through the conversion of local roads to so-called 'bike boulevards' that slow vehicle traffic and give priority to cyclists.", "", "
Safe active streets are cycle routes on quiet local streets, where cyclists are given priority and vehicle\u00a0speeds are capped at 30 kph.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "", "
Single-lane slow points give bikes priority on safe active streets, such as Moorland Street in Doubleview.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "More than 20\u00a0streets have been converted or\u00a0are in development across the state.", "Ms Saffioti said $265 million was being spent over the next four years to expand cycling and walking infrastructure.", "That includes new protected bike lanes in Victoria Park, new shared paths across the city and a new $50 million river crossing for cyclists next to the Causeway.", "", "
Rita Saffioti is overseeing the multi-billion dollar construction of WA's Metronet rail upgrades, which will include new cycle routes to train stations.(ABC News: Eliza Borrello)
", "Ms Saffioti also promised better local connections to Metronet train stations.", "Long-term bike strategies are being developed across WA, while Ms Saffioti said the\u00a0state government would fund up to 50 per cent of the cost of cycle projects under the WA Bicycle Network grants program.", "
Flat, sunny Perth could be 'cycling capital'
", "Mr Brodie said Perth was well placed to be a cycling and active transport powerhouse.", "\"We've got the most days of sunshine, we're flat and we've got this amazing river through the middle of our city, the majority of which is public foreshore,\" he said.", "", "
An artist impression of a\u00a0proposed $50 million\u00a0cycle bridge crossing the Swan River at the Causeway.(Supplied: Main Roads WA)
", "\"We've got this main artery through the city, which could be feeding all these cycle routes.", "\"Sydney for instance doesn't have that, it's mostly a privatised harbour shore.", "", "
Mr Brodie said Perth's topography and attractions could make it a cycle destination.(ABC News: Gian De Poloni)
", "He pointed to Portland as an international example of a place with a strong cycle culture.", "\"What I find particularly inspiring about Portland is that it's an American city,\" Mr Brodie said.", "\"America has a typical love of cars, just like Australians do.", "\"It shows that we can do it, we can change over time.\""]
